examples.description: assigns an instance variable @board to an array with 9 blank spaces " "
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#initialize assigns an instance variable @board to an array with 9 blank spaces " "

examples.description: allows you to assign and read the @board instance variable
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#board and #board= allows you to assign and read the @board instance variable

examples.description: allows "X" player in the top left and "O" in the middle
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#move allows "X" player in the top left and "O" in the middle

examples.description: returns true/false based on position in board
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#position_taken? returns true/false based on position in board

examples.description: counts occupied positions
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#turn_count counts occupied positions

examples.description: returns the correct player, X, for the third move
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#current_player returns the correct player, X, for the third move

examples.description: returns false for a draw
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#won? returns false for a draw

examples.description: returns true for a win
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#won? returns true for a win

examples.description: returns true for a draw
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#draw? returns true for a draw

examples.description: returns false for a won game
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#draw? returns false for a won game

examples.description: returns false for an in-progress game
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#draw? returns false for an in-progress game

examples.description: return X when X won
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#winner return X when X won

examples.description: returns O when O won
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#winner returns O when O won

examples.description: returns nil when no winner
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#winner returns nil when no winner

examples.description: updates the game to the state of the hash after a first turn to middle
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#turns updates the game to the state of the hash after a first turn to middle

examples.description: updates the game to a win after 5 turns
examples.full_description: ./models/tic_tac_toe.rb TicTacToe#turns updates the game to a win after 5 turns

examples.description: responds with a 200 status code
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game Request Basics responds with a 200 status code

examples.description: initializes a new instance of TicTacToe
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game Request Basics initializes a new instance of TicTacToe

examples.description: shows a welcome message
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board shows a welcome message

examples.description: has a form configured to submit to POST /
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board has a form configured to submit to POST /

examples.description: has a 3x3 table to create the Tic Tac Toe board grid
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board has a 3x3 table to create the Tic Tac Toe board grid

examples.description: each table cell contains an input for the correct index in the board
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board each table cell contains an input for the correct index in the board

examples.description: has a submit button
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board has a submit button

examples.description: submitting the form works
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra GET / - New Game HTML for GET / - A Game Board submitting the form works

examples.description: initializes an instance of TicTacToe
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Updating the game based on form input initializes an instance of TicTacToe

examples.description: sends `params` to the `#turns` method on the TicTacToe instance
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Updating the game based on form input sends `params` to the `#turns` method on the TicTacToe instance

examples.description: sets the values of the form inputs in the board based on the previous moves
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Updating the game form in index.erb sets the values of the form inputs in the board based on the previous moves

exception.message: expected #has_field?("4", {:with=>"X"}) to return true, got false

examples.description: sets the readonly attribute to inputs that have been previously filled in
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Updating the game form in index.erb sets the readonly attribute to inputs that have been previously filled in

exception.message: expected #has_field?("0", {:readonly=>false}) to return true, got false

examples.description: checks to see if the game is won after every move
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Winning the game checks to see if the game is won after every move

examples.description: plays the game and shows the winner page, congratulating X
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Winning the game plays the game and shows the winner page, congratulating X

exception.message: expected #has_text?("Congratulations X") to return true, got false

examples.description: plays the game and shows the winner page, congratulating O
examples.full_description: ./app.rb - Tic Tac Toe Sinatra POST / - Submitting a Move Winning the game plays the game and shows the winner page, congratulating O
